s.text: In Spain, El Pa’s reported that Chile has tried to persuade the United States to find an "extrajudicial" solution to the Pinochet problem, perhaps referring the matter to adjudication.

In the absence of a unifying international story, most of the weekend's papers led on domestic stories, with one notable exception: The European media devoted gallons of ink to the Aug. 11 total eclipse of the sun, which should be visible Wednesday from northern Europe to the Bay of Bengal.
